section.title: This document
section.para: NovaForgeTM is a secured collaborative platform which offers features to manage projects and simplify software development. This document is divided into several chapters. In the first chapters you will learn the basic actions such as creating an account, navigating through the forge and creating and managing a project. The remaining chapters describe each feature included in NovaForgeTM.

section.title: New features of Version 3
section.para: NovaForgeTM Version 3 is based on a completely new architecture according to SOA (Service Oriented Architecture) patterns. The forge is in fact subdivided into functional services (technical event management, document management, configuration management, requirement management, etc.). Each functional service is then implemented by one or more technical solutions (for example, Mantis is a technical solution to the "technical event management" functional service). All these services can be accessed from a secured collaborative portal which manages user rights to the various products, user identification and the links between the tools.

listitem.para: Open Source leader tools: Mantis, Jenkins, Alfresco, SVN, Testlink, Sonar, Nexus, LimeSurvey, DokuWiki, PhpBB, Sympa, etc.
NovaForge specific tools used to manage requirement tracking, manage deliveries, etc.

section.para: One of the basic principles of NovaForge v3 is the plugin concept: each component is included as a plugin. This principle makes NovaForge extremely flexible, both in terms of use and installation. It is in fact relatively easy to add components. The architecture therefore simplifies integration of a new functional service or a new technical component. Concerning usability, the notion of plugin allows several instances of the same component to be instantiated in a project (e.g. several Mantis for the same project: one external and one internal). In addition, communication can be defined between the plugins, for example to create a bug directly from the test tool or from the delivery tool, retrieve sources from the SVN, documents from documentary management and bugs from the bug tracker.

Amongst the numerous other new features of NovaForge v3, the remaining documentation describes the notion of project template, reference project, delivery management module, requirement tracking module, etc.
